law.catch_line: The Commission shall assess a fee on all hospitals whose rates have been approved by the Commission ...
law.text:
The Commission shall assess a fee on all hospitals whose rates have been approved by the Commission to pay for:
To the extent provided for in Title 10, Subtitle 3, Part IV of the Economic Development Article, the amounts required by § 10-350 of the Economic Development Article with respect to public obligations or closure costs of a closed or delicensed hospital; and
Funding the Hospital Employees Retraining Fund.
